name: Tangy Fish Fry Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Tangy Fish Fry Recipe: Fish fillet 1 kg Oil 2 cups Chat masala 1½ tsp Salt 1 tsp Lemon juice 2 to 3 tbsp Ingredients for Batter Gram flour 1 cup Ginger garlic paste 2 tbsp White vinegar ¼ cup Turmeric ¾ tsp Crushed red pepper 1 tsp Chili powder ½ tsp White pepper ½ tsp Carom seeds 1 tsp
instructions: Wash and dry fish, marinate with salt and lemon juice Combine all the ingredients for a batter in a large bowl Add fish into batter. Heat oil in a wok, deep fry fish in batches over moderate heat Remove sprinkle chat masala over fish and serve immediately.
